DOC.brief_summary: Determine accuracy specification label claim pulse oximeter diverse subject population severe signal interference specify saturation range .
DOC.brief_title: Pulse Oximetry_Performance During Severe Signal Interference - PCBA-1 ( Printed Circuit Board Assembly )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject age 18 50 year ( inclusive ) . 2 . Must undergo physical examination license physician , advanced practice nurse physician assistant , include 12 lead ECG , medical history , blood test check complete blood count screen sickle cell trait disease 3 . All female volunteer must negative urine pregnancy test prior participation . 1 . A roomair baseline % modulation < 1.5 % four finger test hand 2 . Pregnancy lactate woman 3 . History syncopal episodes 4 . Hypertension ( define systolic pressure > 145 mmHg diastolic pressure > 90 mm Hg three consecutive reading ) 5 . Premature ventricular contraction ( PVC 's ) symptomatic occur rate 5/minute 6 . History seizure ( except childhood febrile seizure ) epilepsy 7 . Routine use tranquilizer and/or excessive anxiety 8 . History frequent headache migraine 9 . History stroke 10 . Previous injury trauma finger hand may change blood flow vascular supply affect ability test multiple sensor 11 . History `` altitude sickness '' define headache , malaise dizziness mountains aircraft altitude significantly sea level prolonged period time ( > 1 hour ) 12 . History significant respiratory disease , severe asthma , emphysema , etc . 13 . Sickle cell disease trait . 14 . The use medication , preexist medical condition , treatment medical condition reason deem relevant clinician conducting study . 15 . A clinically significant abnormal find medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test ECG . Clinical significance assess principal investigator designee . 16 . Prior known allergy lidocaine ( similar pharmacologic agent , e.g. , Novocain ) 17 . Prior known allergy heparin 18 . History transient ischemic attack carotid artery disease 19 . History myocardial ischemia , angina , myocardial infarction , congestive heart failure cardiomyopathy 20 . History chronic renal impairment 21 . History recent arterial cannulation ( less 1 month prior study ) 22 . History complication previous arterial cannulation 23 . Current use blood thinner
